sourcesContent:
import {request} from "../helpers/request";

const create = async (data: any) =>
  await request({data: data, url: "/todo"})

const getAll = async () =>
  await request({method: "get", url: "/todo"})

const remove = async () =>
  await request({method: "delete", url: '/todo'})

export const TodosService = {
  create,
  getAll,
  remove
}
